p: Cells were fixed with 10% formalin and permeabilized with 0.1% Triton. Immunostains were conducted with anti-NALP3/CIAS1 (NLRP3) (Abcam, Cambridge, MA), anti-tyrosine hydroxylase (Pel Freez Biologicals, Rogers, AR), anti-Î²-Tubulin III (Promega, Madison, WI) antibodies and Hoechst stain (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA). Confocal images were obtained and analyzed with the ZEN Software from ZEISS Microscopy.
